system.description: The spell book is a sizable, bulky item, approximately 2 feet square and 2–6 inches thick, weighing at least 20 pounds. It cannot fit inside any normal sack, regardless of size, but can be carried in a backpack or saddlebag. Written in magical script, the spell book can only be read by its owner unless another individual uses a read magic spell.
